mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(OP.NO) AS CNT FROM ORDEREDPRODUCT OP INNER JOIN ORDERED O ON OP.ORDERED_NO = O.NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OP.PRODUCT_NO = P.NO WHERE P.BRAND_NO = #{brandNo} AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(O.RESERVEDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT OP.NO AS NO , O.NO AS ORDERNO , M.NAME AS MEMBERNAME , M.PHONE , O.STORE_NO AS STORENO , P.BRAND_NO AS BRANDNO , OP.PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCTNO , P.NAME AS PRODUCTNAME , P.PRICE , NVL(C.PRODUCTSIZE, '-') AS CLOTHSIZE , NVL(S.PRODUCTSIZE,'-') AS SHOESIZE , O.ORDERDATE , O.RESERVEDATE , OP.QTY , OP.STATUS FROM ORDERED O RIGHT JOIN ORDEREDPRODUCT OP ON O.NO = OP.ORDERED_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON O.MEMBER_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN CLOTHSIZE C ON OP.CLOTHSIZE_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN SHOESIZE S ON OP.SHOESIZE_NO = S.NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OP.PRODUCT_NO = P.NO WHERE P.BRAND_NO = #{brandNo} AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND O.RECIEVE = 1 AND TO_CHAR(O.RESERVEDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') ORDER BY NO DESC OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 5 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(OP.NO) AS CNT FROM ORDEREDPRODUCT OP INNER JOIN ORDERED O ON OP.ORDERED_NO = O.NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OP.PRODUCT_NO = P.NO WHERE P.BRAND_NO = #{brandNo} AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT M.NAME AS TITLE, O.RESERVEDATE AS "START" FROM ORDERED O INNER JOIN ORDEREDPRODUCT OP ON O.NO = OP.ORDERED_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON O.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND TO_CHAR(O.RESERVEDATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{date}
